channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sen. Collins announces end to ICE large-scale operations in Maine after Noem talks
item.description: U.S. Sen. Susan Collins of Maine says immigration officials have stopped their enhanced operations in the state

item.title: Democrats are poised to trigger government shutdown if White House won't meet demands for ICE reform
item.description: Senate Democrats are poised to block legislation that would fund the Department of Homeland Security and several other agencies

item.title: Death Valley landmark Scottyâ€™s Castle is reopening for limited tours after years of flood repairs
item.description: Scotty's Castle, built in the 1920s, is tucked away in the desert in Death Valley National Park and was one of the park's biggest attractions

item.title: Situation in South grows more dire after days of ice, frigid temperatures and outages
item.description: The situation for some of the most vulnerable people trapped in homes in Tennessee and Mississippi without electricity is reaching a breaking point

item.title: Sea turtle with 3 flippers swims free after Florida rehab
item.description: A loggerhead sea turtle has returned to the Atlantic Ocean after rehabilitation at a Florida turtle hospital
